resources.string: An update is available with new features, better performance, bug fixes and more.
Buy and sell shares from around the world. The shares you buy increase in value to build your net worth. So build a portfolio that pays you returns in your FishPott
Go global with your the items you sell. Put up items for sale on your FishPott and sell them globally without worrying about delivery
Raise funds from around the world for a worthy course. Host your fundraisers on your FishPott so people all over the world can contribute

Find out whats buzzing. Let the world feel your influence by posting what’s going on with you and get likes that give you pearls you can cash out. Oops, your posts can be disliked too, and that’s gonna cost you pearls so be smart. Pearls can be poached, so stay on-line or buy shields to protect them
Host events and invite friends to attend.. If you wanna sell tickets, you can sell all over the world.. You don’t have to worry about validating tickets because you can too
Check your internet connection and try again
Check your internet connection and try posting again
Having a FishPott connects you to the world and empowers you to do more with the connections you make
Your FishPott Is Just A Few Steps Away

We search and suggest people and businesses on FishPott that you may want to connect with using the contacts in your address book. We will ask for the permission to do this shortly.

Your pott gets notifications just to let you know what\'s going on. You get notified when someone linkups up to your pott to follow you, likes or dislikes your posts, shares you own or might be interested in changes in value, when someone buys shares, tickets or any item from your pott. All notifications come with an icon to show you the kind it is
Shares that are doing very well, or being sold at incredibly low prices show at the FLUKE. Your luck counts to finding the best item here

There are so many FishPotts and you need a way to find them and the things they offer. That\'s what SEARCH helps you to do. By typing the right word for your search, you can find YARD-SALES, EVENTS, SHARES-SALES, FUNDRAISERS and more.
So many things are going on. The GlobeFeed shows you news from potts around the world. News can be simply an informative post, a shares or item for sale, an event or a fundraiser
Messenger makes it possible for you to chat with other potts
You can view, transfer, merge or cash-out shares you own at the SHARES CENTER
You can view and manage the content of your pott here
Manage the settings of your pott. Making your pott private, changing the default language and a lot more settings can be done at SETTINGS

We have detected activities in your pott that are either suspicious or in violation of our terms and conditions. You may contact support at suspendedpotts@fishpott.com with your pottname and your account may be unsuspended. You will be directed on how to start using your pott if it is unsuspended

After reviewing your pott, you are required to verify your identity by sending the front and back of your government identification to pottverfications@fishpott.com. Once your pott is verified, you will be directed on how to start using your pott again.

At Settings, you can credit and withdraw from your pott. You can also view transactions, shares owned and dividend payout dates and more.
You can view potts, including yours. When you view a pott, you can poach it\'s pearls, buy shields, message and do more
Find out what is happening with shares, who is selling and who is ready to buy. You never know what you find so go through and let luck do its thing
Transfer shares to other potts. Remember, after transferring a share, they can have to be verified before tranfering more to that same pott
At the Shares Center, you can easily see what shares are in the FishPott world. You can also see their company and value history and potts who are selling
Read about the FishPott features and how it helps you build wealth and connections

FishPott was created to connect people, businesses and investment opportunities mainly shares/stocks and treasury bills. There are businesses that are doing well but need to scale up. With your investment, they can scale up and be bigger, and in that regard, you will receive dividends for being an investor/co-owner. Businesses from all over the world are vetted and the best ones that offer the best investment opportunities and return for your money have their shares hosted on FishPott so you can invest. The FishPot Company works with the Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) to ensure your investments are protected and that businesses report periodically with their earnings.

To buy shares from a business, simply find a \'Shares For Sale\' offer in the newsfeed, or go to the list of hosted shares (on the right of the newsfeed) and click view offers. Once you see an offer you are interested in, you can proceed to buy. After purchase, the shares you bought will be confirmed and registered with the Securities and Exchange Commission first before you can use them.

To make income on FishPott, you can either sell your shares at a value higher than what you bought it for, or hold on to shares until it’s time for the business to pay dividends to it’s investors/shareholders. You can sell your shares by creating a sell offer by posting to the newsfeed. To hold on to shares until it pays dividends, simply buy the shares and do not sell until the dividend pay date.

You can sell your shares by creating a sell offer by posting to the newsfeed. Simply click the bottom-right black icon on the newsfeed, click the ‘Add Shares’ button to add the shares you want to sell, set the right selling price and quantity, enter your Pott password and add it to the post. All you have to do after that is post and other investors who are interested in your offer will buy them and the amount will be credited to your Pott, minus the FishPott commission which is usually 1% the selling price. All purchases will have to be confirmed before proceeds are available for withdrawal

If you own shares and want to transfer them to another person on FishPott, simply go to the ‘Transfer Center’, which is the icon with the red and green arrows, and fill out the form and transfer. All transfers have to be confirmed first before the receiver can use the shares.

Before you can buy any shares, your FishPott Wallet needs to be funded. To credit your FishPott account, simply go to “Settings”, which is the icon at the top-left with three bars. Once you are at “Settings”, you click on ‘Credit Wallet’ and use any of the options to fund your wallet. To withdraw funds, simply go to “Settings”, choose “Withdraw Funds” and let us know how you will like to receive your funds by filling out the form. Once your request is received, it will be processed.
By clicking \'Buy\', you agree to the terms of using the service which includes buying investments. Click here to read.
Read the terms of service for using FishPott
Read about what data we collect and how we use and store them
Finding new messages and suggestions for friends and stock.
It is important that you know what information FishPott collects.
Why does FishPott use your data?
By using FishPott, you are bound by the terms of the service and privacy policy.
This includes news you post, stocks you buy and what you provide when signing up.
To give you a customized FishPott experience.
FishPott will ask for your permission before we access this data. The FishPott App periodically uses this data to deliver messages from users and suggest users you may know to you to connect with.

Find people and businesses you may know. We will like to access your contacts to help you find co-investors, people and businesses you can connect with. The information we collect is in line with our privacy policy.
WE DO NOT SHARE YOUR DATA
Signup information(legal name, age, country, gender, phone number), usage information (news posts and comments) and phone contacts
FishPott will like access to phonebook contacts.
Checking for new messages and suggesting good stocks your friends are buying to you
